banner.title: Free Online Tutoring for K-8 Students!

features.title: Fully Student Run
features.description:
All tutors are experienced highschool students with backgrounds in a variety of subjects.
              Every tutor has the experience and education necessary to guide students through their selected subjects.

features.title: Virtual Sessions
features.description:
Sessions will occur on a regular basis and require both the tutor and student to meet on scheduled video calls.
              Communication is crucial, and the Tutorberry team will maintain close contact and always be open for questions and concerns.

features.title: Wide Variety of Subjects
features.description:
Our tutors are experienced in and prepared to teach a variety of subjects, including mathematics, language arts, science, social studies/history, and foreign language.
              Depending on your tutor, certain subtopics and advanced levels will be available.

offer.title: Interested in Volunteering?
offer.subtitle: Apply to be a tutor and receive volunteer hours! Applications open during the last week of each month.

how_it_works.title: How it Works
how_it_works.subtitle: All students must follow this process in order to get started with our program.

steps.title: STEP 01
steps.subtitle: Register as a student.
steps.description:
To become an official Tutorberry student, fill out the student registration form.
                        Be sure to answer each question as completely and accurately as you can.
                        The results we receive from your registration will determine which tutor you will be matched with and how we keep communication with you during your time in our program.
                        Once you submit your registration, you should hear from our team within that same month.

steps.title: STEP 02
steps.subtitle: Create a session plan with your tutor.
steps.description:
After our team has reviewed your registration, you should receive an email regarding the tutor you have matched with. All subject selections, gender preferences, and special requests are taken into consideration.
                        You will be working with your tutor to establish a session plan for the times and days of the week that best work for the both of you.
                        Once all decisions have been finalized, your tutor will contact us with your session plan.
                        Now that our team has your plan in our records, you are now ready to begin your tutoring!

steps.title: STEP 03
steps.subtitle: Get started with your sessions!
steps.description:
Your tutor will be sending you a link to your meeting calls, and you will be responsible for providing material to work on for each session.
                        Be sure to be on time to every scheduled session, unless directed otherwise.
                        If you have to cancel a session, please be respectful of your tutor's time and notify in advance.
                        Now, you're ready to begin! The Tutorberry team will continue to be in contact with you and will always be available for any questions or concerns you may have.

available_subjects.title: Available Subjects
available_subjects.subtitle: These are the core subjects that our tutors offer. Your tutor may teach one or all of these subjects, including subtopics and advanced levels.

reviews.title: Reviews from Parents
reviews.subtitle: Read what some families from our program have to say about their experience with Tutorberry.

reviews.review: Augustine is a very dependable person who goes above and beyond to help his student.

Linda is the best tutor I've met ever! She knows exactly what young students need to learn and how to teach it effectively. She doesn't push students and gives enough time for them to figure out answers by themselves.
Julie is an amazing tutor my son loves her and she helps him so much. He is learning a lot and she quizzes him on his multiplication facts. Sheâ€™s sweet and kind.

cta.title: Help your child succeed today!
cta.subtitle: Begin your journey to academic success with your personal tutor.

Content.title: Our mission is to make your life easier.
Content.subtitle: Tutorberry is a student-led online volunteer program that provides free tutoring for students in grades 1 - 8. We believe that students deserve easy and cost-free access to the help needed for education, as well as an opportunity to help others within this community.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: Meet the group of high school students who dedicate their time to bringing you the best online tutoring experience.

questions.title: How will sessions play out?
questions.answer: Using the link your tutor provides, you will be joining a video call for your session. The content of the session is completely up to you and whatever material you provide in advance. If you have any specific requests for your tutor, be sure to notify ahead of time.

questions.title: What kind of material will we work with?
questions.answer: The tutoring material is entirely up to you! You may send any screenshots, documents, or files of schoolwork you need help with, or any other academic work of your choosing.

questions.title: How will sessions be scheduled and organized?
questions.answer: Before any sessions officially begin, you will need to discuss a certain schedule with your tutor. This session plan will include the days of the week and duration times of your sessions, which should be consistent. Once your decisions are finalized, your tutor will report back to us with your official session plan, so we will always be informed of your schedule. If any changes should arise, be sure to notify either your tutor or our team in advance.

questions.title: Can tutors get school credit for these volunteer hours?
questions.answer: Yes! Once you feel your time at Tutorberry is complete, you will submit your leave of absence to inform us of your completion. We will follow up shortly with your letter of verification, including the number of hours you have earned and a signature from our advisor.

questions.title: Can we request for a different tutor in the middle of the month?
questions.answer: Definitely. If you feel that your match has turned out to be inadequate, you must submit a tutor request form. After we review your request, our team will match you with another suitable tutor in a timely manner.

questions.title: How can we contact tutors and the Tutorberry team?
questions.answer: The best way to reach our team is through our email, which can be found on our Contact page. We are also active on all social media platforms, so please do not hesitate to reach out to us!
